channel.title: Why is it doing this (picture inside)
channel.description:
Ok, I'm trying to make a interface it's all going well but for some reason the buttons I add are loosing quality. Can anyone give me any advice?
[img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/5223/interfacehelp.png[/img]
Its suppose to look like this: [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/9951/homebuttonp.png[/img]
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Why is it doing this (picture inside)
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

They are all .png. Would the fact that I edited the text onto the buttons in paint make any difference?

Read full topic
item.source: Why is it doing this (picture inside)

item.title: Why is it doing this (picture inside)
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

Look in your cache/Sprites and search for the images, if they are .gif you found the problem.

Read full topic
